scripts.build: npm run build:elm && npm run build:typescript
scripts.build:elm: npm run build:elm-to-ast && npm run build:elm-offline-docs
scripts.build:elm-to-ast: (cd src/features/elm-to-ast && elm make src/Worker.elm --output=dist/worker.js --optimize && mkdir -p ../../../dist/features/elm-to-ast && terser dist/worker.js --compress 'pure_funcs=[F2,F3,F4,F5,F6,F7,F8,F9,A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,A7,A8,A9],pure_getters,keep_fargs=false,unsafe_comps,unsafe' | terser --mangle --output ../../../dist/features/elm-to-ast/worker.min.js)
scripts.build:elm-offline-docs: (cd src/features/offline-package-docs && mkdir -p ../../../dist/features/offline-package-docs && elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output=../../../dist/features/offline-package-docs/elm.compiled.js && terser ../../../dist/features/offline-package-docs/elm.compiled.js --compress 'pure_funcs=[F2,F3,F4,F5,F6,F7,F8,F9,A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,A7,A8,A9],pure_getters,keep_fargs=false,unsafe_comps,unsafe' | terser --mangle --output ../../../dist/features/offline-package-docs/elm.compiled.js)
scripts.watch: npm run build && (npm run watch:elm && npm run watch:typescript)

elmLand.entrypointFilepaths.description: The filepath to your project's Main module, relative to the elm.json file.
